channel.title: AI on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Open Security Summit

item.title: Are our users always smarter than AI?
item.description: About this session Enterprise vendors continue to discover new phishing scams, and insert these new techniques into phishing simulations. Is this reasonable and the most effective use of our users time? If AI is so smart why are we wasting users time, when there is evidence suggests that users don’t have time to be so watchful and careful? Shouldn’t we stop stressing out our users? Transcript: Speaker 1 - 00:00 You.
